*gasp*...!: It looks like you're just scraped up a little... you had me worried!
嘶呼……！: 看起來只有一些擦傷……你讓我擔心死了！

*gasp*...!: I... I've never taken a life before...
嘶呼……！: 我……我之前從來沒有殺過活物……

*gasp*...!: It's sad, but there was no other option.
嘶呼……！: 很難受，但我們別無選擇。

*gasp*...!: Did you have to kill him?
Yeah... I did what I had to do.
I guess the world's a pretty tough place. It was either you or him, right?
嘶呼……！: 我想世界是非常殘酷的。不論是對你來說，還是對牠來說……對吧？

*gasp*...!: ...Aren't they just trying to survive, like us?
嘶呼……！: ……牠們難道不是跟我們一樣，只是想生存下去嗎？

*gasp*...!: They may be our enemies, but I still think they deserve sympathy.
嘶呼……！: 牠們可能是我們的敵人，但我仍然認為牠們值得同情。

*gasp*...!: Still... I did what had to be done.
嘶呼……！: 不過……我還是做了該做的事。

*gasp*...!: Huh? That's pretty funny coming from someone who just got rescued...
嘶呼……！: 蛤？被救的人說這種話還真好笑……

*gasp*...!: But... yeah... Sometimes reality forces us to do things we'd rather not... Guess I'm learning that the hard way.
嘶呼……！: 但是……對啊……有時候現實會強迫我們做一些不想做的事情……我想我學到教訓了。

*gasp*...!: Hey! I saved your life, didn't I? Maybe you should think about that instead of putting me on a guilt trip.
嘶呼……！: 嘿！我可是救了你一命欸？你應該好好思考一下，而不是把罪惡感推給我。

*gasp*...!: Look... You've gotta be more careful from now on. I don't want to lose you.
嘶呼……！: 從現在起，你必須更加小心。我不想失去你。

*gasp*...!: Let's put him to rest nearby... okay?
嘶呼……！: 我們找個安靜的地方把牠埋了吧……

*gasp*...!: Good thing I brought my sword today!
嘶呼……！: 幸好我今天有把劍帶在身上！
